metadata.description: "Dessert Flower" is a tragic romance between two warriors from two countries in a war. After sharing one night with the enemy general, Samon, in an abandoned shack, Byakuren from Koumei realized Samon is a man that could make him forget about his own misery other than his prince. Although Byakuren had tried to forget his night with Samon, he could not resist the desire to meet him secretly. Unfortunately, Prince Souen found out about their relationship, "Can you kill him when you are on the battlefield?"
metadata.name: Desert Flower (Yaoi / BL Manga)
